content: ***it s been 5 years *** since i published my first ravelry design in march of 2012 and it has been fantastic for me in many ways - i have received such joy from designing and from being a part of ravelry and especially from interacting with the wonderful crocheters and knitters here so as a thank you to everyone here is a new/old design - a wide crescent as i know so many of you love inspired by mary konior s fancy fan shawl hers was a square shape - mine has been updated to slope into a gentle curve with options as to width and depth overall shape and even a special option to work it with double_crochet instead of treble stitches i hope you enjoy it as much as i did and if you want company while crocheting come to my ravelry group mad cap fans and join the party
